description: Adds one or more tags to a resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource to apply the tags to.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to add to the resource. You can add up to 50 tags at a time. The tag keys can be no longer than 128 characters. The tag values can be no longer than 256 characters. (string) --- (string) ---
